headline: GTA Online
subtitle: THE DIAMOND FAMILY BUSINESS
content:
When you purchase a Master Penthouse, you become a member of The Diamond family, and the family business needs your attention.

Get in touch with Head of Operations, Agatha Baker by giving her a call to see about Casino Work in Freeroam.

There are also rumors of the oil magnate Duggan family sniffing around the Casino. The Diamond’s owner Tao Cheng and Baker may have some below board work that they could use your help with…
